Name: Love Quest
About the game: You are the creator of the entirely original character, Starkat, as he embarks on a quest to find his sweetheart. Will you find love? Or will you just get trolled again? Find your sweetheart! Talk to the girls in town to see if one of them will be your sweetheart! Tactical Stealth Gameplay! Some people don't appreciate your methods of finding love. Don't let them catch you! Refill your heart! When things get too difficult, you can always rely on Starkat to cheer you up! As the line blurs between Starkat and the real world, many surprises await you in this epic quest for love! You may laugh, you may cry, you will almost definitely be frustrated. Want to help us make Love Quest better? Join our Discord!
